languages.text: {n}Лучшие воины племен погибли в резне, недобитков принял клан бригадиров — на расчистке руин всегда нужны рабочие руки. Пройдут годы, прежде чем численность вандалов восстановится и вновь начнет представлять угрозу.{/n}

{n}The tribes' best warriors have died in the slaughter. The survivors were taken in by the foreman clan — more workers are always needed for rubble removal. It will be years before the Engine Vandals' numbers replenish and they can pose a threat once again.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Лучшие воины племен погибли в резне, недобитков принял клан бригадиров — на расчистке руин всегда нужны рабочие руки. Пройдут годы, прежде чем численность вандалов восстановится и вновь начнет представлять угрозу.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The best warriors of the tribes have died in the slaughter, and the survivors were taken in by the brigadier clan — there is always the need for workers on the ruins clean up site. It will be years before the Engine Vandals' numbers would return to normal and they would pose a threat once again.{/n}

{n}The best warriors of the tribes have died in the slaughter, and the survivors were taken in by the brigadier clan — there is always the need for workers on the ruins clean up site. It will be years before the Engine Vandals' numbers would return to normal and they would pose a threat once again.{/n}

{n}The tribes' best warriors have died in the slaughter. The survivors were taken in by the brigadier clan — more workers are always needed for rubble removal. It will be years before the Engine Vandals' numbers replenish and they can pose a threat once again.{/n}

{n}The tribes' best warriors have died in the slaughter. The survivors were taken in by the brigadier clan — more workers are always needed for rubble removal. It will be years before the Engine Vandals' numbers replenish and they can pose a threat once again.{/n}

{n}The tribes' best warriors have died in the slaughter. The survivors were taken in by the foreman clan — more workers are always needed for rubble removal. It will be years before the Engine Vandals' numbers replenish and they can pose a threat once again.{/n}

{n}The tribes' best warriors have died in the slaughter. The survivors were taken in by the foreman clan — more workers are always needed for rubble removal. It will be years before the Engine Vandals' numbers replenish and they can pose a threat once again.{/n}

languages.text: {n}引擎破坏者氏族最优秀的战士都在这场屠杀中丧命了，而幸存下来的人则被领班氏族收留，毕竟清理废墟总归需要人手。他们恐怕要花上许多年的时间才能重整旗鼓，再次构成威胁。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The tribes' best warriors have died in the slaughter. The survivors were taken in by the foreman clan — more workers are always needed for rubble removal. It will be years before the Engine Vandals' numbers replenish and they can pose a threat once again.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}引擎破坏者氏族最优秀的战士都在这场屠杀中丧命了，而幸存下来的人则被领班氏族收留，毕竟清理废墟总归需要人手。他们恐怕要花上许多年的时间才能重整旗鼓，再次构成威胁。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Los mejores guerreros de las tribus han muerto en la masacre. El clan de los capataces ha acogido a los supervivientes, ya que siempre se necesitan más trabajadores para la retirada de escombros. Pasarán años hasta que los Vándalos del Motor vuelvan a ser una amenaza.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The tribes' best warriors have died in the slaughter. The survivors were taken in by the foreman clan — more workers are always needed for rubble removal. It will be years before the Engine Vandals' numbers replenish and they can pose a threat once again.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Los mejores guerreros de las tribus han muerto en la masacre. El clan de los capataces ha acogido a los supervivientes, ya que siempre se necesitan más trabajadores para la retirada de escombros. Pasarán años hasta que los Vándalos del Motor vuelvan a ser una amenaza.{/n}

languages.text: {n}部族の最高の戦士たちは虐殺で死んだ。生き残った者は准将一族に引き取られた...瓦礫の撤去には常に労働者が必要だからだ。エンジン破壊者の数が補充され、再び脅威となるにはこの先、何年もかかるだろう。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The tribes' best warriors have died in the slaughter. The survivors were taken in by the foreman clan — more workers are always needed for rubble removal. It will be years before the Engine Vandals' numbers replenish and they can pose a threat once again.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}部族の最高の戦士たちは虐殺で死んだ。生き残った者は准将一族に引き取られた...瓦礫の撤去には常に労働者が必要だからだ。エンジン破壊者の数が補充され、再び脅威となるにはこの先、何年もかかるだろう。{/n}
{n}部族の最高の戦士たちは虐殺で死んだ。生き残った者は准将一族に引き取られた...瓦礫の撤去には常に労働者が必要だからだ。エンジン破壊者の数が補充され、再び脅威となるにはこの先、何年もかかるだろう。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Les meilleurs guerriers des tribus meurent au cours de ce carnage et les survivants sont capturés par le clan des chefs d'équipe... On a décidément toujours besoin de plus d'ouvriers pour retirer les gravats. Il faudra des années aux Vandales mécaniques pour s'en remettre et redevenir une menace.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The tribes' best warriors have died in the slaughter. The survivors were taken in by the foreman clan — more workers are always needed for rubble removal. It will be years before the Engine Vandals' numbers replenish and they can pose a threat once again.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Les meilleurs guerriers des tribus meurent au cours de ce carnage et les survivants sont capturés par le clan des chefs d'équipe... On a décidément toujours besoin de plus d'ouvriers pour retirer les gravats. Il faudra des années aux Vandales mécaniques pour s'en remettre et redevenir une menace.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Die besten Krieger der Stämme sind bei dem Blutbad gestorben. Die Überlebenden wurden vom Vorarbeiter-Clan aufgenommen ... bei der Beseitigung der Trümmer kann man gar nicht genug Arbeiter haben. Es wird Jahre dauern, bis die Maschinenvandalen ihre Reihen wieder gefüllt haben und eine Gefahr darstellen.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The tribes' best warriors have died in the slaughter. The survivors were taken in by the foreman clan — more workers are always needed for rubble removal. It will be years before the Engine Vandals' numbers replenish and they can pose a threat once again.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Die besten Krieger der Stämme sind bei dem Blutbad gestorben. Die Überlebenden wurden vom Vorarbeiter-Clan aufgenommen ... bei der Beseitigung der Trümmer kann man gar nicht genug Arbeiter haben. Es wird Jahre dauern, bis die Maschinenvandalen ihre Reihen wieder gefüllt haben und eine Gefahr darstellen.{/n}

{n}Die besten Krieger der Stämme sind bei dem Blutbad gestorben. Die Überlebenden wurden vom Brigadierclan aufgenommen — beim Beseitigen der Trümmer kann man gar nicht genug Arbeiter haben. Es wird Jahre dauern, bevor die Maschinenvandalen ihre Reihen wieder aufgefüllt haben und wieder eine Gefahr darstellen.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Kabilelerin en iyi savaşçıları, kıyım esnasında can verdi. Hayatta kalanlar ise ustabaşı klanına dâhil oldu. Enkaz kaldırırken her daim daha fazla işçiye gerek olur. Makine Vandalları'nın ise eski sayılarına ulaşarak bir kez daha tehlike teşkil edebilmeleri için yıllar geçmesi gerekecek.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The tribes' best warriors have died in the slaughter. The survivors were taken in by the foreman clan — more workers are always needed for rubble removal. It will be years before the Engine Vandals' numbers replenish and they can pose a threat once again.{/n}
